resource.name: Little Rock Parks Safety - February 2017 to Date
resource.description: This dataset delineates the hazard identification, risk assessment, elimination or mitigation, and tracking to completion of all identified safety hazards resulting from on-going safety audits and inspections of Little Rock parks from February 2017 to date.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Association Boundaries 2019' (3ti5-7qwp) the point in column 'clr_parks' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations' (kp8k-tt9x) the point in column 'clr_parks' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations 2021' (2m93-nqiv) the point in column 'clr_parks' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Wards' (t2qk-n4g3) the point in column 'clr_parks' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'LRPD Patrol Districts 2021' (bvk6-adqe) the point in column 'clr_parks' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Each hazard being processed is tracked to completion from cradle to grave
Each identified hazard is submitted for maintenance action internally or via local Contractor
Work requests not completed in a reasonable time-frame are reviewed and re-submitted
Name of parks audited initially and/or inspected routinely as a result of on-going risk management process
Geographical location of each park property
This data set allows referencing of the physical location of parks on a map
Date represents initial assessment by current Data Coodinator

resource.name: Little Rock Police Department Statistics 2016

resource.name: Information Technology Help Desk Tickets Completed

resource.name: Positive Prevention Programs
resource.description: This Dataset contains the list, location and overall details about the Positive Prevention Programs contracted to provide services targeted towards youth ages 6-17 who would benefit from: personalized investment into their inherent talents and abilities; quality programming that addresses the gaps in academic enrichment; development of life skills to prepare them for the future; and increased exposure to career opportunities.

resource.name: Parks Volunteer Program Hours and Savings

resource.name: Community Violence Reduction Services
resource.description: This Dataset contains the list, location and overall details about the Community Violence and Intervention Programs. These programs are contracted to provide services to communities disproportionately impacted by the Covid-19 public health emergency and the seen increase in criminal activity in Qualified Census Tracts.  Organizations will provide relevant knowledge, skills and abilities in at least one (1) of the following designated areas:  Conflict Resolution/Anger Management, Domestic Violence Prevention/Intervention, Hospital-based Intervention, Prevention of Criminal Activity through Violence Intervention, Life Skills and/or Workforce Readiness, Mental Health and Wellness.

resource.name: Fire Atoms
resource.description: Little Rock Fire Department's Atoms represent the detailed response areas for each of our Fire Districts. Each polygon represents a dispatch code, or "Atom", for a unique dispatch sequence, an ordered list of the nearest patrol districts, used for reference by the Fire Dispatcher.

resource.name: Rental Registry Properties
resource.description: Quick Export Link If after viewing our Rental Registry, you know of a rental property that needs to be researched by the City, please use this form to report it: https://bit.ly/3mxvLQS This dataset contains the active rental properties registered with the City of Little Rock. The ordinance requires that all rental properties be registered with the City and renewed annually. Registration is required for each residential “dwelling unit” that is owned or managed by an agent along with any commercially rented properties.

resource.name: Police Calls for Service December 2020 to Year to Date
resource.description: This dataset contains Police Calls for Service from December 2020 to Year to Date. The addresses have been generalized to block level and offset to protect the privacy of our residents.  Incidents involving sensitive call types have had the addressing removed. Those include: Assist Medical, Child Abandonment, Child Abuse Report, Death, Harassing Communication, Police - Overdose, Police - Suicide, Rape, Sexual Abuse Report, Terroristic Threatening and Vacation Home Report.  All call data posted is preliminary and therefore, the data may change upon further investigation.
columns_description: Time the first unit assigned to the call arrived at the scene of the incident
The time that the first police unit that indicated they were en route to the call arrived at the incident location.
Unique Identifier for each Police Incident

resource.name: Down Payment Assistant Program
resource.description: This dataset contains a list of the homes that the City has provided down payment assistance for purchase. The City of Little Rock has allocated funds to assist low and moderate income first time homebuyers to purchase owner occupancy residential properties within the city limits. Applicants must be pre-approved by a lender. The program funds are provided by HUD through the HOME Investment Partnership Program.
